casebody.data:
Eddie C. Thomas v. Review Board of Indiana Employment Security Division, William H. Skinner, J. Frank Haley, and Ralph Miles, as Members and as consituting the Review Board of Indiana Employment Security Division, and Blaw-Knox Foundry & Machinery, Inc. [No. 2-1276A491. Filed October 26, 1978. Transfer granted July 18, 1979.]

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
